citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocols 2022-0005 using 20 pigs and 2023-0001 using 30 rabbits did not include or contain a sufficient rationale for
number of animal numbers to be used. The Principal Investigator proposing animal activity must provide a rationale for
the number of animals to be used for IACUC review and approval. By not providing a rationale, an unnecessary amount of
animals may be used for covered activities. Ensure Principle Investigators include a sufficient rationale for the number of
animals to be used in a covered activity as required. Note: No animals have been used for either study at the time of
inspection. Correct by 13 March 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC Administrator and Facility Representative.
End of report.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(e)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Protocols 2022-0005 using 20 pigs and 2023-0001 using 30 rabbits did not include or contain a sufficient rationale for 
number of animal numbers to be used. The Principal Investigator proposing animal activity must provide a rationale for 
the number of animals to be used for IACUC review and approval. By not providing a rationale, an unnecessary amount of 
animals may be used for covered activities. Ensure Principle Investigators include a sufficient rationale for the number of 
animals to be used in a covered activity as required. Note: No animals have been used for either study at the time of 
inspection. Correct by 13 March 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC Administrator and Facility Representative. 
End of report. 
 
End Section
